
### practical TOCTTOU races?  {.smaller}


* can use symlinks <it>maze</it> to make check slower 

   * symlink <code>toprint.txt</code> $\rightarrow{}$ <code>a/b/c/d/e/f/g/normal.txt</code>
   * symlink <code>a/b</code> $\rightarrow{}$ <code>../a</code>
   * symlink <code>a/c</code> $\rightarrow{}$ <code>../a</code>
